name: Kerning Cultures Company
description: Developer of a storytelling application intended to offer radio documentaries. The company's application offers independent podcasts raising the bar for audio storytelling and journalism and offers stories from regional myths of the Middle East and North Africa with podcasts, enabling customers to get audio stories and also a lineup of immersive Arabic and English podcasts.
one_liner: Developer of a storytelling application intended to offer radio documentaries. The company's application offers independent podcasts raising the bar for audio storytelling and journalism and offers stories from regional myths of the Middle East and North Africa with podcasts, enabling customers to get audio stories and also a lineup of immersive Arabic and English podcasts.
